meta.review_title: CALL ME SINCE YOU DONT WANT ME CALLING YOU
meta.review_content:
Telkom does not have a customer service department. You can try to get hold of them is 20 different ways - it is IMPOSSIBLE. I understand the virtual - but there are limits. 
I have been logging my issues with my 2 data sims for 6 weeks now and i have no response. And your DUMB bot on twitter just responds with bot answers. You ask me to DM you my details and the bot gives me junk answers,
I NEED HELP WITH MY DATA SIMS. THERE IS NO INTERNET CONNECTION - I HAVE DATA ON BOTH SIMS
